PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-09181999-05-250,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisAppointment of ARTHUR B. TRUDEAU, of Aylmer, Quebec, as a temporary member of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending May 31, 2000, effective June 1, 1999, and order that ARTHUR B. TRUDEAU shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act.
Attachments
